definition: to have second thoughts about sth/to think better of
see 轉文|转文[zhuai3 wen2]
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
variant of 念[nian4], to read aloud

sentences.english: Turn to peruse a to think, ego for the sake of this face depart the Rui surname river's mountain regardless of?
sentences.chinese: 转念一想，难道自己为了这颜面就弃睿氏江山不顾？

sentences.english: It initially rejected their application, but changed its mind.
sentences.chinese: 一开始此项目申请被拒绝，不过后来转念通过。

sentences.english: He took his knife and fork, and was going to commence eating, when the inclination appeared to become suddenly extinct.
sentences.chinese: 他拿起他的刀叉，正要开始吃，忽然又转念了。

sentences.english: Could he have Colonel Fitzwilliam in his thoughts?
sentences.chinese: 难道他在替费茨威廉上校转念头吗？

sentences.english: At first, she wanted to call the guards, but on second thoughts she changed her mind.
sentences.chinese: 起先，她想叫卫兵，但是一转念又改变了主意。

sentences.english: But other days, I took it in stride.
sentences.chinese: 但是我转念一想，就能泰然处之。

sentences.english: Then I turned my thoughts to consider wisdom, and also madness and folly.
sentences.chinese: 我转念观看智慧，狂妄和愚昧。

sentences.english: Then I returned, and I saw vanity under the sun.
sentences.chinese: 我又转念，见日光之下有一件虚空的事。

definition: in mind
to ponder/to reckon/to turn sth over in one's mind
to consider/to ponder
to reckon/to consider/to turn over in one's mind
think to oneself
to laugh involuntarily/Taiwan pr. [e4 ran2 shi1 xiao4]
without any reason/for no reason
hidden smile/smirk/to rejoice covertly/secret satisfaction concerning one's evil plans
laughable/funny/ridiculous
what for/why/how
secret passage/secret tunnel
to be about to
to be on the verge of saying what is on one's mind
to hesitate
to hate and resent/angry and full of grievances
to get angry
